Key Match Events: Cook made a Clemente-like throw to nab Tommy Pham in the third inning
Cook scored from first base on an Isiah Kiner-Falefa base hit in the fifth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Billy Cook was wearing 21 to pay tribute to Roberto Clemente on his day
The number 21 was stenciled into the grass at his position in right field at PNC Park
Post-Match Reflections: Cook expressed pride in playing the game the right way as a tribute to Clemente while wearing the number 21
Manager Derek Shelton noted Cook's comfort and fast play style despite being in the Majors for only eight days
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cook debuted by falling into the stands to make a catch
The Pirates were able to hang on to beat the Royals, 4-3
Cook's performance included both defensive and offensive contributions
